content.webTitle: Fake math: huge 'error' in Trump budget | The minute

fields.headline: Fake math: huge 'error' in Trump budget
fields.bodyText: It emerged that Donald Trump’s budget spends the same $2tn twice. Former Treasury secretary Larry Summers called it “the most egregious accounting error in a presidential budget in the nearly 40 years I have been tracking them.” Trump’s ‘bad cop’ budget Republican House members voted for the current healthcare bill without waiting to hear its cost estimate. Today the congressional budget office said the plan could save money... by leaving 23m more people uninsured over the next 10 years. Trump on tour Democrats warned that the Trump organization is currently failing to track receipts from foreign sources – money that Trump had vowed to hand over to the US treasury. Constitutional pitfalls loomed... Read Jon Swaine’s report US voters believe that Trump is abusing the powers of his office by a 54% to 43% margin, according to a new Quinnipiac poll. Trump’s approval rating was 18 points underwater at 37-55. Click here to watch video. It might take just a minute to catch up on the latest politics news. But good journalism takes time and costs money. If you like the Guardian’s politics coverage, please make a contribution. Thanks for reading! Make a contribution today
